column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////After finally trying Pequod's and Giordano's
column2: I think Lou Malnati's is by far a step above. Easily the best deep dish pizza I've ever had
column3: and up there as one of my favorite pizza joints overall. Crust
column5: cheese...it's a perfect balance all around. A must try for anyone visiting Chicago wanting to try a traditional deep dish style pizza.
